column1: Local Foods////I really like this place! I try to eat vegetarian as often as possible
column2: and while this place doesn't have too many veggie options
column3: the ones they do offer hit the spot and are hard to beat. I had an avocado soup that was to die for
column4: but I suppose it is seasonal because I don't see it on their current menu. But I could eat their market veggie sandwich every day...I love sandwiches and it's hard to find a great veggie sandwich without missing meat
column5: but they make it happen. The sides are pretty good
column6: I love their potato salad and the house made chips are excellent
column7: but the local fruit I got was just an orange. Tasty
column8: but I'd like to see them offer a variety. The mintade is really good too. I will say that seating here can be a problem
